D

DeviceLine - Class in <Unnamed>
The DeviceLine class This class stores the image of the list of efficient and inefficient devices appearing on screen during the game, it stores an array representation of the pixels of the image, storing a 0 where there is no device, a 1 for an efficient device, and a -1 for an inefficient device..
DeviceLine(String) - Constructor for class DeviceLine
This is the class constructor, it calls the Image class constructor to create an Image to associate with a DeviceLine object.
deviceType(int, int) - Method in class DeviceLine
This returns an int representation of what kind of device is stored at a particular pixel location in the DeviceLine image, by referencing the colours 2D array.
display() - Method in class Game
This method displays all the graphics for the Game window.
display() - Method in class Highscores
This method will display all the graphics of the Highscores window.
display() - Method in class Instructions
This method will display all the graphics of the Highscores window, and implement the mechanics of the left and right arrows, as well as the back button to the menu.
display() - Method in class Learn
This method will display all the graphics, and manage all the mechanics of the Window including navigating the conveyor belt, matching descriptions with devices, and moving to the Quiz Window at the end.
display() - Method in class LevelSelect
This method will display all the graphics of the LevelSelect window.
display() - Method in class Menu
This method displays all the graphics, and implements all the buttons of the Menu window.
display() - Method in class Quiz
This method displays the dragging and dropping game, and it runs the animation of items being redrawn as they are dragged.
display() - Method in class SplashScreen
This method displays the animation for a period of time, shows the loading screen (last frame of animation), and then moves on to the Main Menu.
display() - Method in class Window
The abstract display method that must be implemented by all subclasses containing the Window content.
